name: MEC All Day Essentials Boxers - Men's
description:
Relaxed fitting boxers that move easily under other layers. The soft recycled polyester fabric, ergonomic shape and chafe-free seams keep you comfortable while you're working hard, relaxing, or exploring another part of the world.Made of moisture wicking recycled polyester and spandex.HeiQ antimicrobial treatment keeps things fresh.Merrow seams throughout are smooth against your skin for a chafe-free wear.Front opening for answering nature’s call.4in. inseam.

        Sustainability
